item.title: Vehicles parked on pavement in Fordmill Rd blocking access to water meters and external stop cocksess to water meter and external stop cock, 12th November
item.description:
Vehicles are parking over Thames Water meter metal grates on pavement blocking access to water meters and external stop. cocks. Metal grates clearly marked Water are being parked pavements outside Block 13 - 18 Huntsworth Court in Fordmill Rd. Huntsworth Court situated on corner of Canadian Ave and Fordmill Rd Catford prohibiting property owners from being to turn off external stop cocks.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Fordmill Road, Southend, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Traffic mounting pavement to avoid road closure, 12th November
item.description:
Traffic mounting pavement in both directions to avoid road closure. Putting pedestrians at serious risk of inlury. This happens every time roadworks are carried out here. The closure needs to be more than tiny cones that are easily moved out of hte way. Its dangerous and a liability to the utility company and the council
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Honor Oak Park, Forest Hill, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Crossing surface needs repairing properly, 12th November
item.description:
Someone has recently dug up the cobbled pedestrian crossing. Instead of returning it to its original condition ie lovely cobbles, they have lazily and inappropriately covered this lovely crossing with tarmac. Please can the contractors be tasked with returning to the crossing and repairing the road back to its original design. Many thanks.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 3, Widmore Road, Plaistow, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Leaves, 12th November
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Josephine Avenue, Brixton, London

item.title: New bedding plants need replanting, 12th November

item.title: Large gaps between newly laid cobbles, 12th November
